subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|じ|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=じ}} {{m|zh|地|tr=dij<sup>H</sup>}}. The [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] reading, so likely the initial borrowing. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} ''dì''.

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|ち|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ち}} {{m|zh|地|tr=dij<sup>H</sup>}}. The [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] reading, so likely a later borrowing. The devoicing of the initial consonant might indicate a dialectal source. Compare modern {{etyl|hak|-}} ''thi'', {{etyl|nan|-}} ''tī''.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ち}}

# [[earth]], [[land]], [[ground]]
# a [[place]], a [[region]], a piece of land
# [[territory]], [[dominion]]
# {{qualifier|of a crate, etc.}} the [[bottom]]

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|つち}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=つち}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
